Name: Vodka Rickey
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz) glass .
Prepare garnish of length of lime peel.
Review: Lacks interest but balanced and hard to fault as a simple and refreshing drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Vodka Rickey contains 159 calories
